traits.name: (Striker) Cleave
traits.detail: You can attack two adjacent targets that are within reach, dealing full damage to each.

traits.name: Charger
traits.detail: If you moved more than 20ft in a straight line towards your target, make your melee attack roll with advantage. On a hit, you knock your target prone in addition to any other effect.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.detail: The minotaur attacks twice with their greataxe.

actions.name: Greataxe
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 22 (2d12+9) slashing damage.

actions.name: Gore
actions.detail: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ [attack] vs AC. _Hit:_ 16 (2d8+7) piercing damage. If you moved at least 10' in a straight line toward your target before making this attack, deal an additional 9 (2d8) piercing damage, and the target must make a [dc-secondary] STR save or fall prone.

actions.name: Thunderous Stomp (1/day)
actions.detail: Each creature within 30' of the minotaur must make a [dc-primary] CON save or take 13 (3d8) thunder damage and fall prone (half damage on successful save).
